name: 2021 C64 Basic Games Compilation
description:
A series of three  D64 disks containing  various games ported from several 8-bit computers to the Commodore 64 in 2021.

1. Abfangjaeger 20
2. Abfangjaeger 64
3. Advanced Wayby Adding Numbers
4. Advanced Wayby Square Numbers
5. Airline
